Name: Name Change, Rev. William E. Gardner Place, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to naming sixteen public thoroughfares and public places, Rev. William E. Gardner Place, Borough of Queens, Rev. Frederick Sutter and Rev. Carl Sutter Corner, Borough of Staten Island, Sylvia Simowitz Way, Borough of Queens, John Cifichiello Way, Borough of The Bronx, Georgina Soccodato Way, Borough of The Bronx, Rev. David M. Cory Place, Borough of Brooklyn, Monsignor Dorney Way, Borough of Staten Island, Nick Bruno Way, Borough of Staten Island, The Greater Bright Light Place, Borough of Brooklyn, Officer Michael Buczek Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Bishop J. Arthur Jones Place, Borough of The Bronx, Milt Hinton Place, Borough of Queens, Harry Douglas Way, Borough of Queens, Liberty Pole Boulevard, Borough of Brooklyn, Sal Candrilli Place, Borough of Staten Island and  Leonard Stavisky Place, Borough of Queens.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsRev. William E. Gardner Place31st Avenuebetween 100th Street and 101st Street

      �2. The following corner name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsRev. Frederick Sutter and Rev. Carl Sutter Corner        none the northeast corner of Beach Street and St. Paul's Avenue
      
      �3. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsSylvia Simowitz Way     89th Roadbetween 130th Street and 132nd Street
	
      �4. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsJohn Cifichiello Way   Mace Avenuefrom Bronxwood Avenue to Williamsbridge Road

	�5. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsGeorgina Soccodato Way Morris Park      Avenuefrom White Plains Road to Hunt Avenue

	�6. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
	
New namePresent nameLimitsRev. David M. Cory Place      Avenue Tbetween East 14th Street and East 15th Street

	�7. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
	
New namePresent nameLimitsMonsignor Dorney  WayRichmond Terracebetween Wall Street and St. Peter's Place
	�8. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsNick Bruno WayMaple Parkwaybetween Walloon Street and Netherlands Avenue
	
      �9. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsThe Greater Bright Light Place  Sutter Avenuebetween Hemlock Street and Crescent Street
	
      �10 The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsOfficer Michael Buczek AvenueEdgecombe Avenuebetween Jumel Place and Amsterdam Avenue
	
      �11. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsBishop J. Arthur Jones PlaceJefferson Placebetween Boston Road and Franklin Avenue
      
      �12. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsMilt Hinton Place113th Avenuebetween Marne Place and 175th Street
      
      �13. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
      
New namePresent nameLimitsHarry Douglas WaySidway Placebetween Selover Road and Farmers Boulevard
      
      �14. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
      
New namePresent nameLimitsLiberty Pole Boulevard84th Streetbetween 16th Avenue and 18th Avenue

      �15. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
      
      
New namePresent nameLimitsSal Candrilli PlaceJoyce Streetbetween Naughton Avenue and Seaver Avenue
      
      �16. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
      
New namePresent nameLimitsLeonard Stavisky  Place29th Roadbetween 137th Street and 138th Street
      
      � 17. This local law shall take effect immediately.
